projects.description: This application showcases the projects I have buit using HTML, CSS, Javascript (JQuery - NodeJs..etc).
This application takes a list of data from a source and display a maximum of 10 per page. The pagination numbers at the bottom of the page allow users to navigate the list of data with ease.

OOP Game Show App is built using JavaScript and is a "phrase Hunter" game where players have to guess letters contained on hidden phrases. The player tries to guess the phrase by selecting individual letters from an onscreen keyboard...
